dict.string:
Stickies converts your iPad to a handwriting stickies tool. Like the stickies or post-it you used everyday !
Take notes in meeting, brainstorm ideas , illustrate thoughts,paint funny arts, or just quick memo ...... Depends on your imaginations !
1. It is very simple to use *************************
Once you open the application, anyone could use it in 3 seconds. That is our goal for design. Keep it simple and useful.
2. It is a real sticky note with your finger on iPad *************************************************** You can turn your iPad into the sticky notes with finger ! Just touch then you get it. That is our pursuit, make iPad better than physical object.
Features include: ***************** Create new note and manage note list Change pen size,color Change note type,color Erase function Clear All by one click Save note as image and email to friends easily
Any questions,please feel free to contact us by email to design4app@gmail.com

This application helps to create cool photo effects with professional photography knowledge. If you are PS fan,or just want to share some photo with effect to your friends,you will love this one.
Compared with other apps,the biggest advantage is the easiness to use with just only one adjustment slider. We have wrapped complex magic algorithm behind and we will continue to concetrate on this.
Easy to share with twitter,facebook,email etc.
Here are some demo result from Flickr http://www.flickr.com/photos/16779604@N03/sets/72157626037242142/
Current supported special effects: *** Sepia color,build old photo style *** *** Oil Painting *** *** Charcoal *** *** Sketch, pencil effect *** *** Spread *** *** Swirl *** *** Blur *** *** Implode with fun *** *** Emboss *** *** Vignette *** *** Shade *** *** Flip&flop ***
More to be continued ......
Supported iOS devices: iPad,iPhone,iPod ( iOS 4.0+ )
Welcome for further communication via email design4apple@gmail.com twitter @design4apple

Search photos from flickr gallery for iPhone/iPod (all from 3.0 ) without flickr account login.
It is most easy way to search photos with key words,firstly 32 thumbnail images loaded, load more as you like. When you need see details of interest photo, just click the thumbnail, and you will download the details on demand. This way will help you save traffic cost.
This application can help you find favorite wallpaper and set up as yours.
We provide email for you input feedbacks for us improve more. Also give you easy chance to give rate or comments about this application.

This application provide one-slider controller for you to generate sepia toning effects, and integrate Facebook,Twitter,EMail etc.
Share with your friends, you will get a lot fun !
What is sepia toning effects ? from wiki http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Photographic_print_toning#Sepia_toning
Popular social network such as facebook and twitter are supported in this app.
This version is supported both for iPhone&iPad from iOS 3.2. One time purchase for both devices. We are focusing on professional image processing, with simple finger touch application to replace complicated operations using PhotoShop. Maximum ease and comfort in usage were our main goals when creating the user interface. Just enjoy experimenting with your photos and leave other concerns aside! And that’s not all! Focus one point and make it best !!!

Turn any photos into oil painting effects with your finger, share with your friends immediately with facebook,twitter,or email.
This version is supported both for iPhone&iPad from iOS 3.2. One time purchase for both devices.
This application is unique professional oil painting photo effects & filters application. We are focusing on professional image processing, with simple finger touch application to replace complicated operations using PhotoShop. Maximum ease and comfort in usage were our main goals when creating the user interface. Just enjoy experimenting with your photos and leave other concerns aside!
